body.name: Portable Washing Machine,10L High Capacity Mini Washing Machine with 3 Modes Timing Cleaning,Small Foldable Laundry Bucket by for Socks Underwear or Small Items,Travel Camping Apartments
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 8 hrs 11 mins
features: 🩳【Upgraded 10L Large Capacity】This is a mini folding washing machine is upgraded to 10L large capacity with unfolded dimensions of 12*12*6 inch, and folded dimensions of 12*12*3 inch. The foldable design is easy to store when not in use. Easily fits under a stool or bed without taking up too much space in your home.

🩲【10W Power Motor】With 10W powerful motor, the portbale mini washing machine gives the sufficient power enables the turbine to form a forward and reverse pulsator to wash clothes automatically. The washer switches the forward and reverse turbo work every 20 seconds to remove dirt strongly. This portable mini washing machine is a good helper for household chores.

🧦【Special Washer for Small Items】Mini portable washing machine is specially designed for delicate and small items, ideal for washing light clothes that need to be cleaned separately, such as baby clothes, underwear, towels, socks, vests, toys or other small items. 2-3 pcs baby clothes, 5-6 pcs underwear, or 10 pairs of socks in one load.

👕【3 Washing Modes】One button to control the mini washing machine, just touch the button for two seconds to start or off the washing machine. 【Note: The portable washing machine cannot automatically drain】Touch the "washing" button, the blue light will be on and the buzzer will beep once, press again to the program until the program is closed. The washing machine has 3 programs: 5/ 10/ 2(representing the washing time of 5 minutes/ 10 minutes/ 2 minutes).

📌【Important Information】 ❗(1) This mini portable washing machine is used for some small and delicate items. Please don’t put some heavy items like sweaters and bed sheets. ❗(2) This small washing machine does not have a dehydration basket and is NOT a dryer. ❗(3)Be sure to keep the trackpad dry when using the washing machine. If the trackpad is wet, the operation will be insensitive.
body.description: 👚Here Is The Reason Why You Choose This Mini Washer 🧦Time & Space Saving: It takes only about 10 mins to wash the item, and the folding design can reduce storage space. 🧦Easy to Use: Just one touching button to control the washing machine. 🧦Easy to Carry: The portable washing machine is lightweight and convenient, you can take it camping or traveling. 🧦Great Gift: small washing machine will be an amazing gift for people who love cleanliness, travel frequently, live in school, and family with babies, pets, and patients. 📌Important Information: ❗(1) This mini washing machine is used for some small and delicate items. Please don’t put some heavy items like sweaters and bed sheets. ❗(2) This small washing machine does not have a dehydration basket and is NOT a dryer. ❗(3)Be sure to keep the trackpad dry when using the washing machine. If the trackpad is wet, the operation will be insensitive. ❗(4) 10L capacity mini portable washing machine, 2-3 pcs baby clothes, 5-6 pcs underwear, or 10 pairs of socks in one load. ❗(5) The mini washer cannot automatically drain. You have to open the outlet to drain after washing. Please remember to close the water outlet after draining the water. 🥼How to Use: 🌀One button to control the washing machine, just touch the button for two seconds to start or off the washing machine. 🌀Touch the "washing" button, and the blue light will be on and the buzzer will beep once, press again to the program until the program is closed. 🌀The washing machine has 3 programs: 5/10/ 2(representing the washing time of 5 minutes/10 minutes/2 minutes). ⭕Specification: Voltage: 100-240V Power: 10W Output voltage: DC12V Washing time: 10 minutes Folded size: 12*12*3 inch Unfolded size: 12*12*6 inch 📦Package Lists: Folding Washing Machine*1 Adapter*1 User Manual*1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased demerara sugar for my Highland Scottish Shortbread (I prepare the dough, roll into log, chill, roll in demerara sugar, slice, and bake). The sugar arrived quickly, was fresh, and absolutely delicious. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best to use on my Triple Ginger Cookies!
reviews.reviewText: When making my triple ginger cookies, very little sugar in added to the recipe. So, rolling the cookie dough in the Mimosa Demerara Natural Sugar makes the cookie perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini Washer, Big Help!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got this mini washer recently, and it’s been great for small washes! Really saves space cause it folds up, and washes stuff in like 10 mins. Super easy to use with just one button, no complicated stuff. It’s light and easy to carry, so I’m thinking of taking it for camping. It’s mostly for small and delicate items, so don’t expect to wash big things in it. Sometimes I wish it could hold a bit more, but for quick washes, it’s perfect. Definetly a good buy for people who travel a lot or live in small places. Great for a quick wash of light clothes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
